name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - N and O | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three clues.  For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid".  You must come up with these answers.  The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word.  In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink".  I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink".  For this quiz, the first five answers will begin with an N, and the last five will begin with O.  Good luck!

Las Vegas lighting element - Long time - Atop

Remember, it starts with N!
Star, as in super _ - Eggs - Virginia
Back of the neck - Gorilla - Physical Education
Tidy - Consume - Location; e.g. _ the store
Point where curves cross - Poem - Delaware

Now each answer will begin with an O!  And this first one has four clues

Person who has vowed to do religious work - Sheepish - Past due date - Devoured
Yellow dye - Sonny's partner in music - Not him
Piece of music given a number - Infectious material - We
questions.explanation:
Opus.

	Opus (as in "Mr. Holland's Opus") - Pus - Us

questions.text: Citrus fruit - Stove - French rock band
questions.explanation:
Orange.

	Orange - Range - Ange (formed by the Decamps brothers)
